orig_text:
TransportProperties := ...
      SecurityParameters  := ...

      Preconnection := NewPreconnection(LocalSpecifier,
                                        RemoteSpecifier,
                                        TransportProperties,
                                        SecurityProperties)
      Listener := Preconnection.Listen()
correct_text:
TransportProperties := ...
      SecurityParameters  := ...

      Preconnection := NewPreconnection(LocalSpecifier,
                                        RemoteSpecifier,
                                        TransportProperties,
                                        SecurityParameters)
      Listener := Preconnection.Listen()
notes: Using wrong variable name for SecurityParameters variable in pseudocode, happens 4 times in the section.
